casebody.data:
State
v.
James Howard Killian 459P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2016.

Mr. Jeffrey William Gillette, Mr. Michael E. Casterline, Attorneys at Law, For Killian, James Howard.

Ms. Yvonne B. Ricci, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Todd Williams, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of December 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2016."
